titleStmt.title: Organon salutis an instrument to cleanse the stomach : as also divers new experiments of the virtue of tobacco and coffee, how much they conduce to preserve humane health / by W.R. ...
titleStmt.author: W. R. (Walter Rumsey), 1584-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne for D. Pakeman ...,
